objective: Defend friendly cluster from approaching hostiles.
intel: Multiple hostile signatures inbound on converging vectors. Prioritize heavy targets before they breach the perimeter.
tacticalProtocol: Eliminate RED_CUBE contacts quickly — they are fast but fragile.
Focus fire on HEAVY_RED_CUBE targets early; they deal catastrophic damage on arrival.
ALIEN_8_BIT contacts require two shots — track HP bars and finish what you start.
